title: FDI
content:
The Foundry of Ralf Herrmann

Ralf Herrmann studies Communication Design at Bauhaus-University Weimar.  
He is the webmaster of [www.typografie.info](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222537/http:/www.typografie.info/ "www.typografie.info"), the well-known independent web site dedicated to typography and fonts in Germany.  
Herrmann is founder of a web design agency in Germany, writes books about fonts and typography and is advisor of FontShop Berlin.

[http://www.fonts.info](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204222537/http:/www.fonts.info/ "http://www.fonts.info")
